CustomField.formula: IF( AND(matchIndex__c>=0.600, matchIndex__c<0.800), 'MIDDLE MATCH', IF( AND(matchIndex__c>=0.800, matchIndex__c<0.880), 'HIGH MATCH', IF( AND(matchIndex__c>=0.880, matchIndex__c<0.950), 'STRONG MATCH', IF(matchIndex__c>=0.950,'FULL MATCH','N/A') ) ) )
CustomField.label: Verdict
